properties.name: Catholic Charities of the Diocese of Raleigh, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 715 Nazareth Street, Raleigh, NC, 27606Catholic Charities is a private, nonprofit, social service agency serving the people of Eastern North Carolina. The organization is a strong advocate for comprehensive immigration reform. Photo by Kamoteus (Vacation Mode) licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/ is not of the actual location.

properties.name: Confucius Institute
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 1101 Gorman Street, Raleigh, NC 27606The Confucius Institute is a partnership among NC State, Nanjing Normal University, and the Office of Chinese Language Council International under Chinese Ministry of Education. Photo by Untitled blue licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/.

properties.name: Consulado de México
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 336 E. Six Forks Rd., Raleigh, NC, 27609El Instituto de los Mexicanos en el Exterior (IME) a través del Comité Electoral Local de la circunscripción consular de Raleigh, Carolina del Norte. The photo of the flag of Mexico is by dskciado and was licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/.

properties.name: Durham Social Security Office
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 3004 Tower Blvd., Durham, NC 27707The Durham Social Security Office neighbors University Tower and is at the intersection of Tower Boulevard and Pickett Road. Photo by swanksalot licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/deed.en.

properties.name: El Centro Latino
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 110 W. Main St. Ste 2F, Carrboro, NC 27510El Centro Latino provides social services, educational and cultural programs to the Latino community of Orange County, North Carolina. The photo, by BellaBim, shows the Weaver Street Market in Carrboro and was licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/.

properties.name: El Pueblo, Inc.
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 4 N. Blount Street, Raleigh, NC El Pueblo is a North Carolina non-profit statewide advocacy and public policy organization dedicated to strengthening the Latino Community. Photo by Suzie T licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/deed.en.

properties.name: Hispanic Chamber of Commerce
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes  2209 Century Drive, Raleigh, NC, 27612The mission of the North Carolina Hispanic Chamber of Commerce is to advocate, promote and facilitate the success of Hispanic businesses in collaboration with the Business Community at large. The photo is a web-resolution screenshot from the organization\'s website. No affiliation is claimed with the organization.

properties.name: NC China Center
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 10900 World Trade Blvd, Raleigh, NC, 27617The mission of the North Carolina China Center (NCCC) is to serve as a statewide catalyst and resource for the promotion of economic, educational, governmental and citizen pursuits between North Carolina and the Greater China Region (GCR, including mainland China, Hong Kong, and Taiwan).

properties.name: Raleigh-Durham USCIS Field Office
properties.description: Posted by Ericrhodes 301 Roycroft Drive, Durham, NC 27703This office handles scheduled interviews on non-asylum related applications. The American flag photo is by ninjapoodles and was licensed via http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/.
